project.allDo: The project has passed all stages

fakeGantt.lastStepText1: To start reviewing your application, please
fakeGantt.lastStepText3: After that we will assign you a personal manager.
fakeGantt.assignManagerText:
At this stage, the head of the investment committee appoints
a manager who will deal with all the documents 
 on the project.
fakeGantt.checkDocsText:
The manager has been assigned! Now, your application will pass
validation, during which you may be asked to upload additional project documents to
.
fakeGantt.checkDocsRes:
Check the documents and set their status.
When sending the verification results, please provide details of what you want
from the investor to do in the comment.
fakeGantt.investCom:
The project is under consideration by
investment committee
fakeGantt.investComText:
Within 6 days it will be decided on the investment.
Upon completion of the review - the manager will download the protocol
of the decision.
fakeGantt.landDocs:
Registration of documents
for land use right
fakeGantt.landDocsText1:
Depending on whether you are using your land plot for
project implementation and whether you need funding from
budget of the Republic of Kazakhstan -
manager will ask you for a package of documents.
fakeGantt.landDocsText2:
Also, the manager will send an application to the public service center to obtain the
state act/purchase of land use right
for 5 years.
fakeGantt.landDocsSpk:
Investor uploads design and estimate documentation from
and feasibility study, if he provides his land plot.
fakeGantt.landDocsManager:
You need to send an application to the public service center, then to the main department of
land committee to obtain
state act/redemption of land use right
for 5 years.
fakeGantt.landDocsAdmin:
The manager needs to send an application to the public service center, then to
Main Department of Architecture Land Committee to obtain
state act/purchase of land use right
for 5 years.
fakeGantt.uploadedDocs2: The second stage - upload the documents
fakeGantt.uploadedDocs2Text: To start reviewing the project at the second stage, please upload the documents.
fakeGantt.retryDocs:
The documents have been sent for
revision
fakeGantt.retryInvest:
Please upload the amended information
for unaccepted documents.
fakeGantt.retrySpk:
The manager sent the project for revision.
Investor is given 15 days to download missing documents.
fakeGantt.errorStageText:
Unfortunately, your project was not accepted during
the application review.
fakeGantt.spkHeads: Project under consideration by the board of social entrepreneurial corporation/board of directors.
fakeGantt.spkHeadsText:
We're on the final approval of the project.Within 21 days, a decision on the investment will be made.  At the end of the review
, the manager will upload the decision protocol.
fakeGantt.agreementInvest:
Congratulations! You just have to wait until the manager will contact you
to sign the contract.
Implementation of the project is not far off!
fakeGantt.agreementManager:
Contact the investor to clarify the details of the contract
and upload it to the project.

documents.infoDoc:
You can upload multiple documents in one field. The weight of uploaded documents should not exceed 10MB per field. 
 You can upload an image, PDF file, Excel spreadsheet, Word document, .zip and .rar files
documents.clickHere: Click here to download the file
documents.errorMsg: This document was sent for revision. Please delete the old document and upload again
documents.afterSend: After sending documents, you can delete or change them only with the help of a manager

gantt.law: Rules for the exit from the project
gantt.text: The initiator of the project confirms that all the information above is true, corresponds to the true facts and expresses its consent to participate in the project in the amount of the mentioned investments, including its consent to the JSC 'SEC' to carry out the analysis of production/economic activity of the initiator of the project in order to determine the solvency of the initiator of the project to participate in the project implementation. The initiator of the project does not object to the visit by the expert - employee of JSC 'SEC' of the objects which are assets in the given project and is ready to give all necessary information. 'SEC' JSC reserves the right to apply to any person known or unknown to the project initiator who can assist in making a decision regarding participation of the project initiator in the project. In case of preliminary approval of the project by the Board of SEC, the project initiator shall develop a Business Plan and submit the relevant documents.

reset.title: Password recovery
reset.sendSms: We will send you a verification code to recover your password, your email or phone
reset.sendedSms: We have sent you a verification code to recover your password to the address
reset.pwdInfo: The password must be at least 8 characters long, with alternating case of letters of the English alphabet, values ​​and using numbers

newProject.title: Project applicant questionnaire
newProject.list4: What new project will bring to the development of the city
newProject.list5: Why the project is necessary for the city
newProject.emailInfo: Enter mail in the format pochta@site.com
newProject.powerInfo: Write the amount of work performed per day.
newProject.endText: was sent to your manager for review. Within 2 days you will receive a confirmation notification.
newProject.info1: the amount of money you want to contribute to the project.
newProject.info2: the amount of money that you want to attract from the state of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
newProject.info3: After you send the completed application form, with all the necessary documents, you just have to wait for confirmation from the manager.
newProject.info4: All information entered by you is saved. If some documents are missing now, you can insert them later, you will not need to fill in the fields again.
